CONTACT
Have a Question?
Let’s Talk
Our experienced staff is ready to answer any questions you may have about Tigertail Lake. Whether you're planning a team building retreat, an unforgettable field trip, a special event or party, or just have some general questions - we're happy to help! Drop us a line using the form below or give us a call at
954-201-4500

Paddleboards
​Get with the latest fitness craze that teaches strength, coordination, and balance. Stand-Up Paddleboarding (SUP) is a great way to work on core fitness while relaxing on the lake. Our stand-up paddleboards are specially designed to help you get started with this sport today with a one-hour rental!

We can help!
Psst... still have questions?
We’re here to help. Click on the link below to see answers to FAQs about
Paddleboarding & Watersport Rentals
at Tigertail Lake. To ask any questions directly to a team member, you can always
contact us
or give us a call at
954-201-4500
.
VIEW OUR FAQS
Are there alligators in the lake?
The lake is full of fish, turtles, iguanas, and sometimes marsh bunnies, but no alligators have been spotted.
How deep is the lake?
The lake reaches a depth of 60 feet at the center.
Do we have to wear lifejackets/PFD’s?
Yes, Lifejackets/PFD’s must be worn and buckled at all times, even while on the dock. This is non-negotiable and for your safety.
Is swimming allowed?
No. Tigertail Lake is a non-swimming lake, unless taking a SCUBA or Lifeguard class and are under the direct supervision of a qualified Tigertail Lake instructor.
Do you have to be a certain age?
There is no specific age requirement, but children must weigh at least 30lbs to fit into our smallest lifejackets. Children under 18 must be accompanied by a parent or responsible adult.
Can I switch equipment during my hour rental?
No, all rentals are by the hour.  If you think you would like to mix it up, you can purchase our all day “Paddle and Play Pass” which allows you to mix and match kayak, paddleboard, and canoe.
Can I bring my own equipment?
You can bring your own PFD as long as it is Type lll, Coast Guard approved.  No other equipment (personal kayaks, SUP’s, etc.) is allowed.
Do I have to reserve in advance?
No, it is not necessary to reserve in advance.  You can, however, expedite the check-in process and guarantee that you’ll have equipment available if you reserve online ahead of time.
Do you accept cash?
No. We gladly accept Visa, Mastercard, and Discover cards. Unfortunately we no longer accept American Express.
Do I need to sign a waiver?
Yes! Anything fun requires a waiver these days. Minors (Under 18) must have a waiver signed by parent or legal guardian.
Do we have to rent gear to hang out on the beach?
No. Everyone is welcome to hang out on the beach - rentals are not required. However, to access the water or any water-based activities, a rental is required.
What’s the difference between a kayak and a canoe?
Our kayaks are sit-on-top, very stable rotomolded plastic watercraft that seat one (single) or two (double) kayakers. Canoes are sit-inside and have an aluminum hull, and they allow for two to three adults to traverse the lake.
Can we use the grills?
Yes! You’re welcome to use the grills as part of the Pavilion Rental package.
Can we snorkel?
No. Recreational snorkeling is not allowed at Tigertail Lake. However, snorkeling may be taught as part of the SCUBA curriculum, under the direct supervision of a qualified Tigertail Lake SCUBA instructor or Divemaster.
Is fishing allowed?
No. Fishing is not allowed at Tigertail Lake.
Can I SCUBA dive without an instructor/guide?
No. All diving must be done under the direct supervision of a qualified SCUBA instructor or one of our Divemasters. Recreational diving is not permitted at Tigertail Lake.

No. All diving must be done under the direct supervision of a qualified SCUBA instructor or one of our Divemasters. Recreational diving is not permitted at Tigertail Lake.

How it works
Ropes course activities offer participantsextraordinary learning opportunities about risk-taking, performing under pressure, collaboration and support dynamics between team members. Once mastered, these personal and professional life skills are often what propel individuals and teams to the next level of success.At Tigertail Lake,we can develop an interactive, experiential team-building program customized to meet your specific needs. Your next adventure is only a click away!
A DAY ON THE ROPES
Choose a program type:
First, choose the program timeframe that best fits your schedule and provides the right amount of time to achieve your goals. Desired program outcomes can be as simple as team bonding experiences, as complex as team dynamic analysis, or anything in between!
Choose a program type:
First, choose the program timeframe that best fits your schedule and provides the right amount of time to achieve your goals. Desired program outcomes can be as simple as team bonding experiences, as complex as team dynamic analysis, or anything in between!
Half Day
The half day program is up to 3.5 hours, and is perfect for ultra-focused outcomes and programming. The compact nature of the half-day program means we need to stay focused on just a handful of activities in order to achieve the desired outcomes. An example of a good candidate for a half-day program would be a team-building session that combines several hours of our world-renowned team-building with a session on the Tigertail Aerial Challenge O-Course, our new ropes course. Keep in mind that a 3.5 hour time block goes fast, and trying to cram too many activities into a half-day program can lead to feeling rushed or simply not reaching any of the desired outcomes.

Customize your program!
Choose from any of our modules: team building (low ropes), climbing (high ropes) or water and waterfront-based activities. Problem-solving activities are designed to challenge a group to work together to accomplish a goal. Facilitators choose activities based on the team's physical abilities and group dynamics. Facilitators will give an appropriate challenge level specific to each team. With each activity, we reflect on our success and discuss what worked or didn’t work and how it can apply to future team challenges.

team work
Team building
Working together is the key to success. This holds true regardless of scale - from interpersonal relationships all the way up to multi-national corporations. Our professional facilitators will create a specific program that is focused on your team, your goals, and your desired outcomes. Each facilitator has the experience to put together a sequence of activities that will ensure a unique learning opportunity while dynamically adjusting the programbased on the performance of the group to ensure desired outcomes are achieved. Whether you want to challenge your team, evolve your corporate culture, or simply see what happens when your team is pushed out of their comfort zone, our goal is your success.

We have several rooms available for rental that can accommodate a range of meetings. You need it for a small group, or a bigger one? We're here to work with you. We understand that each company has its own needs. That's why we offer a variety of conference rooms, with different features that will best work with you, your company and your employees. Small or large? Formal or informal? We'll find your best fit, and remember, Audio/Visual and WiFi is included.

Our Conference Room will seat up to 16 and has full audio/video capabilities via an HD projector and surround sound. It is also fully capable of video meetings and WiFi is included.
Large Classroom
The Large Classroom seats up to 53 in a fully configurable room. The large classroom a lso includes an HD projector and audio/video capabilities. WiFi is also included.
The Pavillion
The Pavilion is configurable outdoor covered area that will comfortably seat approximately 25 guests. The Pavilion doesn’t have audio/video capabilities, but we do have a sound system for music, entertainment, or public speaking and WiFi is included.

VIEW OUR FAQS
Can you send me a list of all the possible team-building initiatives?
Our professional  facilitators know thousands of different initiatives, and we’re happy to make suggestions based on your desired outcomes. We also sequence our programming dynamically based on the performance of the group so we might decide to call an ‘audible’ mid-program to ensure successful outcomes. That being said, it would be nearly impossible to send a complete list of team-building initiatives and selecting the initiatives ‘a la carte’ without a thorough understanding of program sequencing is unlikely to result in a great outcome. We encourage you to work with our program development team to get a suggested itinerary with alternate suggestions to ensure the best possible program.
How large/small a group can I bring?
The minimum group size depends on the type of program, but ranges from 5-10.  The maximum group size is only limited by your imagination, as long as you can’t imagine more than 500 people. But seriously, the maximum is actually determined by the type of program or event. We've accommodated several thousand people at the facility for a 'retreat' style of event, and our typical programs max out at several hundred. That's not to say we can't work with you, so please contact us and let us know what you've got in mind.
What if it rains?
If it rains during your event, your event becomes 10x more extreme! Low ropes (team-building) activities may be moved to an indoor facility (pending availability) or under cover. Climbing and water activities may continue in the rain as long as facilitators and lifeguards can maintain visibility. However, in the event of lightning, all participants are required to seek shelter. Tigertail Lake is equipped with a Thorguard Lightning Prediction and Warning System.

Party Packages, Events, and More
Tigertail Lake Recreational Center is the perfect place for your birthday party, private party, corporate retreat, private event, and more! We have packages for everybody, and can even custom-tailor a package to create the perfect event.
Private parties and events can be organized to take advantage of our rooms or our beautiful waterfront. You can even rent out the whole facility! Baby showers, wedding events, corporate retreats, conferences, workshops… you’re only limited by your imagination. Reach out to us at 954-201-4500 and we’ll happily discuss what you’ve got in mind and explore the possibilities.
How’s it all work?
Party “packages” are three hours long and are booked in one of  the available time slots: either 9:30am-12:30pm, 1:30pm-4:30pm, or (during Summer) 5:00pm-8:00pm.
Each party package features two one-hour sessions of activities, starting on the hour (so, for example, at 10:00am for the 9:30am time slot.) The half hour at the beginning and end of the party time slot are intended to give participants an opportunity to arrive, eat, socialize, etc. and are not considered part of the ‘activity sessions’.
You choose what activities you’d like during your activity sessions.
An hour rock climbing and an hour on the Tigertail Aqua Challenge. Stand-up paddleboarding for an hour and a session on the Tigertail Aqua Challenge. Two back-to-back sessions on the Tigertail Aqua Challenge. You get to choose the combination that works for you. Please note that some options do have limitations, so if you have questions or run into any trouble during the booking process let us know and one of our staff will help you figure out the best options. Also,
the activities available during your two activity hours are set during the booking process
and may not be changed because we staff your party with skilled professionals ahead of time. For example, if you book a watersports party you may not change it to a climbing party when you arrive, or halfway through the party. Please plan accordingly.
What’s Included?
The base package includes use of a covered shade tent area, 2 picnic tables, and shared use of the kitchen.
If you need more picnic tables, participants may occupy our public tables but they may not be moved under the shade areas; you may also choose to bring additional folding tables if you’d like. There are plenty of opportunities to upgrade your party with additional amenities, such as air conditioned rooms, pop-up tents, and more – if you have a particular need, give us a call and we can work on helping you add it to your party package. All parties are staffed with ACCT-certified Ropes Course Practitioners and American Red Cross-certified lifeguards to ensure safe operation and the safety of patrons. Minimum age for parties depends on the activities, so please make sure you let us know how old the participants will be ahead of time so we can make the right recommendations and ensure a great party!
Food and drinks
You’re welcome to bring any food and drink options that you like, and cake! However,
no alcohol is permitted on campus
(or smoking.) If you want to leave the food preparation to the professionals, there are many wonderful catering options available, many pizza delivery services, even a private chef!
We even have a wonderful food truck available right on campus called
El Farolito
, serving up world-famous delicacies from Argentina, or they can prepare any meal you like right on the premises (call 305-467-0391 for more information about El Farolito and what they can do for you.)
El Farolito is a phenomenal food truck and well-known in the South Florida “foodie” scene for its delicious Argentine fare. But that’s not all they can do for you! Regardless of the type of food, El Farolito can cater to your specific needs. The chef of El Farolito is well-versed in many different types of cuisine – all you have to do is reach out and let them know the details of your event.
PLEASE NOTE: Party Packages are not private events!
The activity sessions are shared with the general public, and the facility is still open to the public, though pavilions and shade areas reserved for the party
are
private and for the exclusive use of the party. To make sessions private, there is an additional charge and it is possible to rent the entire facility (i.e. closed to the public.) For additional information on these privacy options, please reach out to us.
We have several options and combinations available for our party packages. You can select from the list below, or click on the button for a complete list of available options.
Click here for a complete list of party packages available!
Tigertail Aqua Challenge Party
Get after it! All the fun of the Tigertail Aqua Challenge for two full hours!
Book an Aqua Challenge Party now!
Canoe Battleship and Aqua Challenge Combo Party
Enjoy one of our combo packages with one hour of Canoe Battleship and one hour on the Tigertail Aqua Challenge!
Rock Wall and Aqua Challenge Combo Party
Tigertail Aerial Adventure Party
Rock Wall Party
Rock climbing on our rock climbing walls at the Tigertail Aerial Challenge, this is a great option for patrons of all ages and sizes.
Rock Wall and Paddlesports Combo Party
